content: in just 45 minutes make these cozy crochet wrist warmers a stylish and functional accessory for cold weather these fingerless gloves make for a great gift for the holidays keep your hands warm while maintaining finger dexterity materials * 25 grams of medium weight yarn * 5mm crochet hook * scissors * yarn needle dimensions includes instructions to adjust sizing * rectangle before sewing 15 centimeters wide x 13 centimeters long 5 9 x 5 1 inches * after sewing 8 centimeters wide x 13 centimeters long 3 1 x 5 1 inches
